aircraft.value: Titan Heavy - AC-2261-312 at Zone-2 Facility

defect_observed.value: Targeting pod stabilization failure. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fire Control component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 06/11/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 09/11/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 07/11/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 11/11/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 11/11/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fire Control component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
